original_text: The slothful hideth his hand in his bosom; it grieveth him to bring it again to his mouth.
korean_text: 게으른 자는 그 손을 그릇에 넣고도 입으로 올리기를 괴로워하느니라

sentences.original_text: The slothful hideth his hand in his bosom
it grieveth him to bring it again to his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 다시 입으로 가져가는 것을 괴롭게 여긴다
